terms.title: Terms of Use & Privacy Policy
terms.content:
This application, {appName}, is provided as a general-purpose starter template. By using this app, you agree to the following:

- The app is offered as is, without any guarantee of reliability or fitness for a particular purpose.
- No personal data is collected, stored, or shared by default.
- If future versions connect to third-party services (e.g. Firebase, analytics), any collected data will be handled responsibly and only to improve the user experience.
- You remain responsible for how you use the app and any content you create or share through it.

For questions, support, or feedback, please contact us at {supportEmail}.

about.title: About Us
about.content: This application is developed by Louis from MGT Bros. Here you can add useful information about the developer, the company, and anything else you want to share.
